abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews premiere of Luca Veggetti dance piece Bacchae, performed by Morphoses/The Wheeldon Company at Joyce Theater.
snippet: Morphoses, directed by the former City Ballet principal Lourdes Lopez, is back, with the resident artistic director Luca Veggetti.
lead_paragraph: Morphoses, directed by the former City Ballet principal Lourdes Lopez, is back, with the resident artistic director Luca Veggetti.

headline.main: Sketching Out Euripides and Mother-Son Dynamic
headline.print_headline: Sketching Out Euripides And Mother-Son Dynamic
headline.seo: ‘Bacchae’ From Morphoses at the Joyce - Review
